channel.title: Help with 317 base for my server!
channel.description: Ok i'm a old user from mopar, i was used to download testscape for example, as base source, and then start making my server but now, there's a new base servers. i downloaded "317 serv" source, which is very diferent from what i've seen, there's no "run" or compile files, just a few folders, and more folders...so..how can i turn that server on..? :S

item.title: Help with 317 base for my server!
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

You’d have to make your own run + compiler files. I suggest you start off with a better base server. Try using one like Delta if you’re unsure. Delta isn’t as good, but its better for beginners

Read full topic
item.source: Help with 317 base for my server!

item.title: Help with 317 base for my server!
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

Ok i’m a old user from mopar, i was used to download testscape for example, as base source, and then start making my server but now, there’s a new base servers. i downloaded “317 serv” source, which is very diferent from what i’ve seen, there’s no “run” or compile files, just a few folders, and more folders…so…how can i turn that server on…? :S

Read full topic
